name: Origin Pulse
description: Your body glows a bright and brilliant blue, sending three beams of focused light at any creature(s) in range. Make a ranged attack for each beam, dealing 1d10 + MOVE water damage on each successful hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Excites the audience a lot if used first.
